pycopancore.model_components.wellbeing_driven_migration.interface module¶

model component Interface template.

class pycopancore.model_components.wellbeing_driven_migration.interface.Metabolism[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface for Metabolism process taxon mixin.

basic_emigration_probability_rate = intensive variable 'basic emigration probability rate' (absolute value of emigration probability rate at its point of inflection), not None, scale=ratio, unit=[a^-1 H^-2], >=0, default=8e-13¶
emigration_probability_characteristic_slope = intensive variable 'emigration probability's characteristic slope' (slope of the normalized sigmoid function at its point of inflection), not None, scale=ratio, unit=unity [], default=1¶
emigration_wellbeing_quotient_offset = intensive variable 'emigration wellbeing quotient offset' (wellbeing quotient at which emigration probability has its point of inflection), not None, scale=ratio, unit=unity [], default=3¶

Interface for Model mixin.

description = 'migration flow between social_systems is proportional to a sigmoid function of wellbeing difference and product of populations'¶

class pycopancore.model_components.wellbeing_driven_migration.interface.SocialSystem[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface for SocialSystem entity type mixin.

emigration = extensive variable 'emigrants per time', not None, scale=ratio, unit=[H a^-1], >=0, default=0¶
immigration = extensive variable 'immigrants per time', not None, scale=ratio, unit=[H a^-1], >=0, default=0¶
migrant_population = extensive variable 'first-generation migrant population', not None, scale=ratio, unit=people [H], >=0, default=0¶
population = extensive variable 'human population', IAMC=Population, CETS=SP.POP, not None, scale=ratio, unit=people [H], >=0, default=1 H¶
wellbeing = intensive variable 'well-being' ((in utility flow units)), not None, scale=ratio, unit=[u H^-1 a^-1], default=1 u H^-1 a^-1¶
